channel.title: JBang on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in JBang on Pi4J

item.title: Running Pi4J with JBang
item.description: JBang project website: https://www.jbang.dev/ What is JBang? As described on their website: JBang lets Students, Educators and Professional Developers create, edit and run self-contained source-only Java programs with unprecedented ease. Want to learn, explore or use Java instantly without setup ? Do you like Java but use python, groovy, kotlin or similar languages for scripts, experimentation and exploration ? Ever wanted to just be able to run Java from anywhere without any or very minimal setup ?
